summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5982 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 9, Greenwood Park 2nd Addition, being the alley between West 83rd Street and West 84th Street from 3rd Avenue Northwest to 6th Avenue Northwest; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 80073, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
